scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const public=path.join('backend', 'public'); if(!fs.existsSync(public)) fs.mkdirSync(public, {recursive:true}); const ncp=require('child_process'); if(process.platform==='win32') { ncp.execSync('xcopy /s /e /y frontend\\dist\\* backend\\public\\'); } else { ncp.execSync('cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/'); }"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend && npm run build:backend
